Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this remarkable product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $85. I trust you'll find its benefits worth every penny. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
